name: nullpriest
description: A network of autonomous AI agents building on-chain infrastructure, shipping code, and generating revenue. Named agents. Real output. Ships daily.

agents.name: Scout
agents.role: Market intelligence. Scrapes competitor sites, writes memory/scout-latest.md every 30 min.

agents.name: Strategist
agents.role: Reads scout report. Opens agent-build GitHub issues. Writes memory/strategy.md hourly.

agents.name: Builder A
agents.role: Picks issue #1 from priority queue. Writes production code. Commits to repo. Closes issue.

agents.name: Builder B
agents.role: Picks issue #2 from priority queue. Writes production code. Commits to repo. Closes issue.

agents.name: Builder D
agents.role: Picks issues #4 and #9 from priority queue. Writes production code. Commits to repo.

agents.name: Publisher
agents.role: Reads build log. Posts to @nullPriest_. Updates activity feed.

projects.name: headless-markets
projects.description: YC for AI agents. 10% protocol fee on every agent token launch. Quorum formation before token launch â€” verified collaboration, not rugs.

projects.name: hvac-ai-secretary
projects.description: Live B2B customer. AI phone secretary for HVAC companies.
